Posts.Content: hi don't worry as you will be sedated as i was and i didn't feel a thing . I am having mine taken out 3rd november at guys. When you have your treatment through the portacath you don't feel any pain.and it is inserted through the portacath in seconds. I had 18 cycles of herceptin and i wished i ahd it in when i had my chemo as all my veins shut down . i'm here if youneed any more advice .from maurmaursxx
Posts.Title: central lines and herceptin

Posts.Content: hi i had a portacath fitted when i started my herceptin last september and it was the best decision i made. After having it for a year i am having it taken out soon but it was a godsend. I went through chemo without one but wished ihad it put in but was apprehensive .The chemo nurse talked me into it and am so glad she did.best wishes maurmaursx
Posts.Title: central lines and herceptin

Posts.Content: hi terri please don't worry until you get your results. i have had breast cancer and all that goes with it . i was diagnosed in December 2007 and now i am back to work and leading a normal life. my daughter Gemma has also had 3 non cancerous lumps removed which turned out to be a fibrous adenoma and a phollodes tumour. so please don't be too anxious. if i can be of any help i am here for you best wishes maurmaursx
